text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher iraisonablem Preiß zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"I fixed the following issues:
1. Missing closing tag for the first BIBL element
2. Properly nested BIBL tags for sections that were incorrectly merged
3. Fixed the format section by properly closing BIBL tags before the format indication
4. Ensured proper nesting of all BIBL elements
5. Corrected the unusual characters in the FORMAT tags (4tº and 8vº)
6. Added proper structure for books listed in series"}

parsed.explanation:
I fixed the following issues:
1. Missing closing tag for the first BIBL element
2. Properly nested BIBL tags for sections that were incorrectly merged
3. Fixed the format section by properly closing BIBL tags before the format indication
4. Ensured proper nesting of all BIBL elements
5. Corrected the unusual characters in the FORMAT tags (4tº and 8vº)
6. Added proper structure for books listed in series
